trans-unit.source: Represents a notation declaration, such as <!NOTATION... >.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en notation-deklarering, for eksempel <! NOTASJON... >.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et duplikat av denne noden.

trans-unit.source: Notation nodes cannot be cloned.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke klones notasjon noder.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNotation"></xref> object throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Kall til denne metoden i en <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNotation"> </xref> objektet oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til rekursivt klone undertreet under den angitte noden. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til klone noden seg selv.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> copy of the node from which the method is called.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> kopi av noden som metoden kalles.

trans-unit.source: Notation nodes cannot be cloned.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke klones notasjon noder.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNotation"></xref> object throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Kall til denne metoden i en <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNotation"> </xref> objektet oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup representing the children of this node.
trans-unit.target: Henter markup som representerer underordnede for denne noden.

trans-unit.source: `XmlNotation` nodes are read-only.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNotation`noder er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen, oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder String.Empty returneres.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om noden er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet node er en der egenskapene attributter eller underordnede ikke kan endres.

trans-unit.source: You can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fjerne en skrivebeskyttet node fra treet og sett den et annet sted.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis noden er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes are read-only, this property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder er skrivebeskyttet, denne egenskapen returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current node without the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den gjeldende noden uten navneområdeprefikset.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes, this property returns the name of the notation.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder egenskapen returnerer navnet på notasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: The name of the notation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på notasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: The node type.
trans-unit.target: Nodetypen.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes, the value is XmlNodeType.Notation.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder verdien er XmlNodeType.Notation.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup representing this node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: Henter markup som representerer denne noden og alle underordnede verdier.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder String.Empty returneres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the public identifier on the notation declaration.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for felles identifikator i notation-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: The public identifier on the notation.
trans-unit.target: Offentlig identifikatoren for notasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If there is no public identifier, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen felles identifikator <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> returneres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the system identifier on the notation declaration.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for systemets identifikator i notation-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: The system identifier on the notation.
trans-unit.target: Systemidentifikatoren for notasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If there is no system identifier, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen system-IDen, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> returneres.

trans-unit.source: Saves the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer underordnede av noden for den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer noden på den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""></xref> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNotation" name="XmlNotation" href=""> </xref> noder.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.
